TestCase.name: testChainingPythonFunction
TestCase.Resource: SELECT pyFunc3(pyFunc2(a + pyFunc1(a, c), b), c) FROM MyTable
LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[pyFunc3(pyFunc2(+($0, pyFunc1($0, $2)), $1), $2)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]])

FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[pyFunc3(pyFunc2(f0, b), c) AS EXPR$0]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[b, c, +(a, f0) AS f0]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[b, c, a, pyFunc1(a, c) AS f0]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testChainingPythonFunctionWithCompositeInputs
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, pyFunc1(b, pyFunc1(c, d._1)) FROM MyTable
LogicalProject(a=[$0], EXPR$1=[pyFunc1($1, pyFunc1($2, $3._1))]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]])

FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, pyFunc1(b, pyFunc1(c, f0)) AS EXPR$1]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, b, c, d._1 AS f0]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testFieldNameUniquify
TestCase.Resource: SELECT pyFunc1(f1, f2), f0 + 1 FROM MyTable2
LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[pyFunc1($1, $2)], EXPR$1=[+($0, 1)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(f0, f1, f2)]]])

FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[f00 AS EXPR$0, +(f0, 1) AS EXPR$1]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[f0, pyFunc1(f1, f2) AS f00]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(f0, f1, f2)]]], fields=[f0, f1, f2])

TestCase.name: testLiteral
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, b, pyFunc1(a, c), 1 FROM MyTable
LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], EXPR$2=[pyFunc1($0, $2)], EXPR$3=[1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]])

FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, b, f0 AS EXPR$2, 1 AS EXPR$3]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, b, pyFunc1(a, c) AS f0]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testOnlyOnePythonFunction
TestCase.Resource: SELECT pyFunc1(a, b) FROM MyTable
LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[pyFunc1($0, $1)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]])
FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[pyFunc1(a, b) AS EXPR$0]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testOnlyOnePythonFunctionInWhereClause
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, b FROM MyTable WHERE pyFunc4(a, c)
LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[pyFunc4($0, $2)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]])

FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, b], where=[f0]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, b, pyFunc4(a, c) AS f0]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testPythonFunctionAsInputOfJavaFunction
TestCase.Resource: SELECT pyFunc1(a, b) + 1 FROM MyTable
LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[+(pyFunc1($0, $1), 1)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]])

FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[+(f0, 1) AS EXPR$0]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[pyFunc1(a, b) AS f0]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testPythonFunctionInWhereClause
TestCase.Resource: SELECT pyFunc1(a, b) FROM MyTable WHERE pyFunc4(a, c)
LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[pyFunc1($0, $1)]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[pyFunc4($0, $2)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]])

FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[pyFunc1(a, b) AS EXPR$0]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, b], where=[f0]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, b, pyFunc4(a, c) AS f0]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testPythonFunctionMixedWithJavaFunction
TestCase.Resource: SELECT pyFunc1(a, b), c + 1 FROM MyTable
LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[pyFunc1($0, $1)], EXPR$1=[+($2, 1)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]])

FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[f0 AS EXPR$0, +(c, 1) AS EXPR$1]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[c, pyFunc1(a, b) AS f0]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testPythonFunctionMixedWithJavaFunctionInWhereClause
TestCase.Resource: SELECT pyFunc1(a, b), c + 1 FROM MyTable WHERE pyFunc2(a, c) > 0

LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[pyFunc1($0, $1)], EXPR$1=[+($2, 1)]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>(pyFunc2($0, $2), 0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]])

FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[f0 AS EXPR$0, +(c, 1) AS EXPR$1]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[c, pyFunc1(a, b) AS f0]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[c, a, b], where=[>(f0, 0)]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, b, c, pyFunc2(a, c) AS f0]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testPythonFunctionWithCompositeInputs
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, pyFunc1(b, d._1) FROM MyTable
LogicalProject(a=[$0], EXPR$1=[pyFunc1($1, $3._1)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]])

FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, pyFunc1(b, f0) AS EXPR$1]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, b, d._1 AS f0]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testReorderPythonCalc
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, pyFunc1(a, c), b FROM MyTable
LogicalProject(a=[$0], EXPR$1=[pyFunc1($0, $2)], b=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]])

FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, f0 AS EXPR$1, b]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, b, pyFunc1(a, c) AS f0]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]], fields=[a, b, c, d])
